sentence.Network_en: Eurasian pink widely cultivated for its flat - topped dense clusters of varicolored flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 广泛种植的平顶、密集、多色串状花瓣的欧亚石竹.

sentence.Network_en: It was said that big country is so - called varicolored world.
sentence.Network_cn: 听说大城市是一个充满诱惑的花花世界.

sentence.Network_en: Opening eyes and stretching four limbs, people discover the varicolored world and feel curious inside.
sentence.Network_cn: 世人睁开眼睛,伸出四肢, 发现了眼前这个五彩缤纷的花花世界,他们的内心是充满著好奇的.
